fullplot: In 1944, the D-Day for the invasion of Normandy by the Allies has failed and Europe has not been released from the German forces. The men of an isolated Welsh village disappear and their wives believe that they have joined the resistance and soon German soldiers arrive at the village. The farmer Sarah Lewis and the German Commander Albrecht befriend to each other along the year.
plot: In 1944 a group of women in an isolated Welsh village wake up to discover all of the their husbands have mysteriously vanished.
title: Resistance
